name: Brick Game - Retro columns arcade/handheld game
name_original: Brick Game - Retro columns arcade/handheld game
description:
Play the popular tetris arcade game on your Mac. This classic puzzle game is easy and fun to play and suitable for kids of all ages. Use the arrow keys on your keyboard to move the and rotate the blocks. Each filled line gets cleared giving you higher score which in turn leads to higher levels with greater difficulty setting. The game ends when one of the blocks has no place to fall.

In tune with the good old days, this app doesn't contain any ads or in-app purchases; just download once and play forever.
